sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container>
      <!-- Top Bar -->
      <!-- Omitted for brevity -->
      
      <!-- Main Content -->
      <v-main>
        <v-col cols="12" style="max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto">
          <v-card class="mx-auto" max-width="600">
            <v-card-title class="blue darken-2 white--text">Project Information</v-card-title>
            <v-card-text>
              <v-row>
                <v-col cols="12">
                  <v-text-field v-model="project.name" label="Project Name" readonly></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12">
                  <v-text-field v-model="project.company" label="Company" readonly></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
              <v-divider class="my-4"></v-divider>
              <v-row>
                <!-- File Input 1 -->
                <v-col cols="12" md="4">
                  <v-file-input v-model="file1" label="Upload File 1" prepend-icon="mdi-upload" :disabled="!!file1">
                    <template v-slot:prepend-inner>
                      <v-btn small @click="file1 = null" v-if="file1">Modify</v-btn>
                    </template>
                  </v-file-input>
                </v-col>
                <!-- File Input 2 -->
                <v-col cols="12" md="4">
                  <v-file-input v-model="file2" label="Upload File 2" prepend-icon="mdi-upload" :disabled="!file1 || !!file2">
                    <template v-slot:prepend-inner>
                      <v-btn small @click="file2 = null" v-if="file2">Modify</v-btn>
                    </template>
                  </v-file-input>
                </v-col>
                <!-- File Input 3 -->
                <v-col cols="12" md="4">
                  <v-file-input v-model="file3" label="Upload File 3" prepend-icon="mdi-upload" :disabled="!file2 || !!file3">
                    <template v-slot:prepend-inner>
                      <v-btn small @click="file3 = null" v-if="file3">Modify</v-btn>
                    </template>
                  </v-file-input>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn color="blue darken-2" @click="submitFiles" :disabled="!file1">Submit Files</v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-main>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: 'Proyecto', icon: 'mdi-folder-outline' },
        { title: 'Asesorias', icon: 'mdi-account-plus-outline' }
      ],
      userId: localStorage.getItem('id'),
      project: { name: '', company: '' },
      file1: null,
      file2: null,
      file3: null
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.fetchProject();
  },
  methods: {
    navigate(index) {
      switch (index) {
        case 0:
          this.$router.push('/student');
          break;
        case 1:
          this.$router.push('/student/asesorias');
          break;
        default:
          break;
      }
    },
    logout() {
      localStorage.removeItem('token');
      localStorage.removeItem('user');
      this.$router.push('/login');
    },
    fetchProject() {
      if (!this.userId) {
        console.error('No user ID found.');
        return;
      }
      axios
        .get(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}`)
        .then((response) => {
          const user = response.data;
          const projectId = user.project;
          if (!projectId) {
            console.error('No project ID found for the user.');
            return;
          }
          return axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/projects/${projectId}`);
        })
        .then((response) => {
          if (response) {
            this.project = response.data;
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error('Error fetching project data:', error);
        });
    },
    submitFiles() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      formData.append('file1', this.file1);
      formData.append('file2', this.file2);
      formData.append('file3', this.file3);
      axios
        .post(`http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}/files`, formData, {
          headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' }
        })
        .then((response) => {
          console.log('Files uploaded successfully:', response.data);
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error('Error uploading files:', error);
        });
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-btn i { color: white; }
</style>
